department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The departments of public works and government services is seeking bids for environmental remediation services in the National Capital Region (NCR) and Ontario (except NCR).
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on August 9, 2023 by 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
duration_in_months: These services will be provided for a maximum duration of 12 months, however, the actual duration may be shorter based upon the awardee finally selected for this project being able to complete the required works outlined in the specifications in a shorter period.  Please visit the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at the link provided for complete details.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Title
**Environmental Remediation Services (Pickering Land Sites) - Request for Supply Arrangement (SA)**

#### Reference Number
WS3510098383-Doc4115900662

#### Publishing Date
2023-07-25

#### Tender Closing Date and Time
2023-08-09T14:00:00 EDT (Note: An amendment to the closing time has been made, please see the tender description for details)

#### Solicitation Number
WS3510098383

#### Expected Contract Start and End Dates (None)

#### Tender Status
**Expiré** (Expired)

#### Procurement Category
**CNST** (Construction and Engineering Services)

#### Procurement Method
**Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner** (Competitive Open Bidding)

#### Selection Criteria
Variations or combinations of the above methods

#### Trade Agreements
The Government of Canada intends to purchase Environmental Remediation services in accordance with the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

#### Regions of Opportunity
National Capital Region (NCR) and Ontario (except NCR)

#### Regions of Delivery
National Capital Region (NCR) and Ontario (except NCR)

#### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Contact Information
Somaratna, Chinthaka (SPAC/PSPC)
chinthaka.somaratna@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Note: This contact information may have changed, please refer to the original tender document for more details

#### Note
Please visit the SAP Ariba Discovery posting for complete details about this tender. Only the following SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:
- Green Infrastructure Partners Inc.
- QM LP (QM Environmental)
